statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%Amazon%' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND transaction_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE account_id = 200 AND balance < 0
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
